item.title: davidson's movie.
item.description: My friend Davidson Cole has made a movie called Design. It is about: Eighteen-year-old Sonya is struggling to save her father from alcoholism after his wife leaves him. Voyeuristic photographer Nicholas is obsessed with women, yet hides behind the prying lens of his camera. Cursed factory worker Seamus and his fiance, Kate, are planning their wedding and coming to grips with the truth about each other–and themselves. The three stories intersect in one evening full of predestined encounters and bizarre circumstances.
